about_the_game:
Feeling the urge to scratch your head? Discover KAL, Guild Studio's miracle product to help you get rid of lice!

With its joystick-powered formula, control Captain Soepp or Lieutenant Xam'Pu and face off against the hordes of Lous the First, king of lice, in an epic solo or co-op adventure.

Dive into a captivating universe where frantic action meets zany humor. "Kill All Lice" takes you to the scalps of Eloise and her family in an epic battle to eradicate an epidemic of fearsome critters. Take the helm as Captain Soepp and Lieutenant Xam'Pu, two heroes determined to fight the invasion. Whether you choose to play solo or team up with a friend, prepare for an experience that will be... completely wacky!

In this 2D Run & Gun game, explore unique environments, that are both hilarious and striking. Face off mutant lice hordes armed with surprising powers inspired by human habits. Grab your weapons, toss grenades, and unleash devastating abilities to fend off enemies with style. Immerse yourself in simple and accessible gameplay designed for players of all kinds.

But "Kill All Lice" is more than just fun—this incredibly entertaining game also carries deeper meaning, offering a subtle reflection on human habits. Discover varied environments influenced by hair types, colors, and dietary habits, while uncovering a heartfelt story about a family’s resilience in the face of adversity.

Get ready to dive into a stunning visual universe which brings to mind a blend of Metal Slug and Earthworm Jim. With meticulously drawn graphics and a retro electronic soundtrack, "Kill All Lice" is a sensory experience you won’t want to miss.

Join the fight for healthy scalps and have a blast while taking care of your own well-being. "Kill All Lice" delivers a playful escape, a sly critique, and an exhilarating dose of humor.

Dare to challenge the lice and become the hero who will save the world, one strand at a time!

short_description: Play as the egocentric Captain Soepp and the sarcastic Lieutenant Xam'Pu in this wacky RFun & Gun to kill evil at its root by defeating the king of lice, Lous the First! Go solo or team up to stop the infestation spreading across Eloise's family! KILL ALL LICE is a proper soap opera adventure!
